title: Report Lost Luggage
description: A passenger has arrived at their destination, but their checked bag did not. They need to file a lost luggage report.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and baggage claim information using their ticket number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the passenger's details and the tag number for the missing bag.

tasks.description: Collect a description of the bag and the passenger's contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary details for the report.

tasks.description: Create a new lost baggage report in the system and provide the passenger with a file reference number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the report and gives the customer a reference for tracking.
